title: Balletts and madrigals to fiue voyces with one to 6. voyces: newly published by Thomas Weelkes.
author: Weelkes, Thomas, 1575 (ca.)-1623.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Este, the assigne of William Barley,
notes: Five partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Quintus."; part 5: "Bassus.".
Signatures: [A]²  B-D⁴; [A]²  B-D⁴; [A]²  B-D⁴; [A]²  B-D⁴ E¹; [A]²  B-D⁴.
At least the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Library of Congress have the sextus leaf (E1) bound with the quintus partbook.
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
